thread.title: RUMOURS: Clement set to sign two-and-a-half-year deal with Swansea
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Clement set to sign two-and-a-half-year deal with Swansea

title: RUMOURS: Clement set to sign two-and-a-half-year deal with Swansea
text:
0 Jan 3, 2017 09:49:17 The 44-year-old could be appointed as the new Swans boss on Tuesday, and is expected to agree a contract until the end of the 2018-19 season 
Swansea are set to offer Paul Clement a two-and-a-half-year deal to become their new manager, according to the Daily Mail . 
The Englishman is currently assistant to Carlo Ancelotti at Bayern Munich, but the Bundesliga giants have confirmed they have allowed their number two to speak to the Premier League club. 
Clement could be appointed as early as Tuesday as the struggling side look to turn things around following a poor start to the season which saw Bob Bradley dismissed after just three months in charge.
